campaigns.name: Kenzo - Brand Bio - Search
campaigns.title: Kenzo
campaigns.slogan: Kenzo has been infusing positive energy and contagious freedom for half a century by boldly proclaiming a polychrome, daring and borderless fashion that celebrates nature and cultural diversity. Founded in Paris in 1970 by Kenzo Takada, the House continues to cultivate and reinterpret codes that make it unique with dynamic modernity.

editorial.name: Kenzo
editorial.description: Kenzo has been infusing positive energy and contagious freedom for half a century by boldly proclaiming a polychrome, daring and borderless fashion that celebrates nature and cultural diversity. Founded in Paris in 1970 by Kenzo Takada, the House continues to cultivate and reinterpret codes that make it unique with dynamic modernity.
